node.excerpt: Dr. Tong Yi is the latest addition to the teaching community at Hunter College’s Computer Science department, and this semester, she is instructing CSCI 13500, otherwise known as  Software Design and Analysis I . my.description: Emily is a junior majoring in computer science. Her strengths are in front-end development and UI/UX.
